thread.title: UMD's Power Outage Game Set for Feb. 9
thread.title_full: UMD's Power Outage Game Set for Feb. 9

title: UMD's Power Outage Game Set for Feb. 9
text:
UMD's Power Outage Game Set for Feb. 9 
By Zach Schneider UMD's Power Outage Game Set for Feb. 9 October 14, 2015 Updated Oct 14, 2015 at 6:56 PM CDT 
Duluth, MN (NNCNOW.com) --- The University of Minnesota Duluth (UMD) men's hockey team has rescheduled its scheduled 2015-16 season opener against Bemidji State for Tuesday, Feb. 9 at AMSOIL Arena, the school announced on Wednesday afternoon. 
The game was postponed this past Friday, Oct. 9, due to a power outage that affected AMSOIL Arena., All tickets that were previously purchased for the Oct. 9 game will be honored on Feb. 9. Fans who cannot attend the Feb. 9 game can have their tickets exchanged for another UMD men's hockey home game (excluding games against Minnesota and North Dakota). 
Click here to subscribe to our daily newsletter. 
Anyone having questions on exchanges and/or refunds is asked to please contact the UMD Ticket Office at umdtix@d.umn.edu or (218-726-8595). 
If tickets were purchased on Ticketmaster.com (800-653-8000) or at the DECC Ticket Office (218-727-4344), those entities will need to be contacted for refunds or exchanges.
